meanings.definition: A Muslim who has made the pilgrimage to Mecca.
meanings.sent1: Many hajis gathered in Mecca for the pilgrimage.
meanings.sent2: The hajis traveled to Mecca for their religious journey.
meanings.sent3: The hajis shared stories of their pilgrimage in Mecca.
meanings.sent4: In Mecca, the hajis found spiritual fulfillment.
meanings.sent5: The hajis' pilgrimage to Mecca was a life-changing experience.

meanings.sent1: The group of hajis included men and women.
meanings.sent2: We met many hajis during our travels.
meanings.sent3: The hajis' hats were all different colors.
meanings.sent4: The hajis' presence added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The hajis' smiles brightened the room.
